title: Star Wars Ep 5 ESB SE - 1080p - ADYWAN - Colour corrected
description:
Adywan does it again! Here is the NFO file:

STAR WARS EPISODE 5: THE EMPIRE STRIKES BACK 1080P AVCHD 1997 SE THEATRICAL VERSION - ADYWAN **REPACK**

VIDEO: 1080p 23.976fps
AUDIO: (selectable using the audio button on your remote)
track 1: English AC3 5.1 @ 640kbps (taken from the laserdisc and not the DVD mix)
Track 2: English AC3 2.0 Directors Commentaries
SUBTITLES: English

Notes:

This is the 1997 SE Theatrical version for the first time in HD and not the updated 2004
version already available. It contains the original Emperor and the 5.1 Dolby Digital theatrical mix
only available on the laserdiscs..

The source used was the German Premier 16GB HDTV broadcast with the English crawl taken from the SkyHD broadcast.

This release has been extensively colour corrected to return the movie closer to what it looked
like pre-2004 ( so no more "blue" colouring to the movie)

A high bitrate .mkv version (about 14GB) will be available soon

Burn WITH iMGBURN to DL-DVD, stick it in your PS3 or Blu-Ray player and enjoy.
